attributes.action: Provide every woman with a personal attack alarm or similar to try and prevent rape
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With rape increasing, averaging 167 women per day in the UK, I think it is about time that all women were provided with a source of protection against an attacker.
For example a personal attack alarm which releases an ear piercing alarm, when activated, which can be heard half a mile away.
They are inexpensive and may just put some attackers off.
Even if Mr Brown would not  provide them for free, if they could be advertised better and offered at an affordable price for all women.
Or any other form of protection for women which would be suitable.

Many thanks
